rukus.text: Vy ne pryyizhdzhayete u budʹ-yaku sytuatsiyu, ne robyte vy deklamuyete budʹ- yakyy Quran, ne robyte vy shcho-nebudʹ, bez nas buduchy svidkamy tut tomu shcho vy robyte tse. Ne navitʹ vaha atomu ye poza vashym Lordom kontrolʹ, tse u nebi abo zemli. Ne ye tam budʹ shcho bilʹsh malyy nizh atom, abo bilʹshyy, shcho ne zapysuyetʹsya u hlybokomu zapysi
Absolyutno, BOZHI soyuznyky nichoho ne bo, ne bude vony sumuyutʹ
Vony ye tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya
Dlya nykh, radistʹ ta shchastya u tse svit, tak zhe, yak i u U maybutnʹomu. Tse ye BOZHYY unchangeable zakon. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy triumf
Ne budutʹ zasmuchenyy yikhnimy vyslovamy. Vsya potuzhnistʹ nalezhytʹ BOHU. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Omniscient

Absolyutno, do BOHA nalezhytʹ kozhnomu u nebi ta kozhnim na zemli. Tsey khto vstanovlyuvaly idoliv bilya BOHA diysno slidkuyutʹ nichoho. Vony tilʹky dumayutʹ shcho vony sliduyutʹ za shchosʹ. Vony tilʹky zdohaduyutʹsya
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto nadav nich dlya vashoho vidpochynku, ta nadav osvitlenyy denʹ. Tse - dokazy dlya lyudey shcho mozhutʹ pochuty

Vony skazaly, "BOH begotten syn!" Vin glorified. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Bahatyy. Yomu nalezhytʹ vse u nebi ta vse na zemli. Vy ne mayete dokazu pidtrymaty takyy blasphemy. Vy kazhete pro BOHA yaki vy ne znayete
Proholoshuyutʹ: "Tsey khto vyhotovlyayutʹ brekhnyu pro BOHA bude nikoly ne maty uspikh
Vony otrymuyutʹ yikhnyu tymchasovu aktsiyu u tse svit, todi do nas ye yikhnye ostatochne vidshkoduvannya, todi my zdiysnyuyemo yikh do suvoroho retribution dlya yikh disbelieving
